meanings.sent1: The old, damaged furniture was unsalably worthless.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was unsalably unappealing to buyers.
meanings.sent3: The unsalably high price tag on the damaged car made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unsalably stained dress was a reminder of the messy dinner party.
meanings.sent5: The unsalably damaged goods were left untouched on the clearance shelf.

meanings.definition: In a manner that cannot be sold
meanings.sent1: The artist's paintings were unsalably due to their poor quality.
meanings.sent2: The fruit was unsalably rotten and could not be put on display.
meanings.sent3: The unsalably slow turtle finally crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The car was unsalably parked in the middle of the road, causing a traffic jam.
meanings.sent5: The unsalably loud music from the party could be heard from miles away.
